First Entry

Due to foreseen circumstances, I will initally have a lot of time to devote to this project. The key to completing this project will be seen through consistency, however. It’s possible that my entry quantity will diminish over time, but I am expecting that I will ge a majority of the grunt work out of the way immediately. This will give me more time to work on documentation and research for aspects of the development that will require it.

Up until this point, I have gotten a three day head start and began sketching out the front end pages. I am using iFixit’s website as a reference. Once I get all of the visual details into place, I plan on updating the theme to that of Google’s Material Design.

Commits

  1. created mockup of guide pages; a few tweaks left to do
  2. fixed bullet indentation
  3. fix thumbnail box-shadows
  4. implement change image on hover
  5. cleanup from image hover and fix underlines in page header
  6. implementing right sidebar on edit page; cannot get mouseover on thumbnails to work…moving on
  7. transferred all css to scss files
  8. finish introduction mockup
